title: XCOM_Enemy_Unknown_The_Complete_Edition_Linux-Razor1911
description:
1 9 1 1 JED



Razor 1911 proudly presents:

XCOM Enemy Unknown The Complete Edition Linux

(C) Feral Interactive



Date: 2014-06-23 Game Type: Strategy

Size: 1 Disc Protection: Steam



Game Notes



Take on a mysterious alien threat and develop a strategy to save your planet

with XCOM: Enemy Unknown. Build and expand your XCOM headquarters and lead

your squad into deadly and fierce battles against the imminent threat

Recruit soldiers and develop them in order to take them into combat, and

uncover and research extraterrestrial technology to enhance and expand your

weapons and capabilities. With this Complete Edition, you'll also receive

access to the thrilling XCOM: Enemy Within expansion pack, as well as the

Elite Soldier, Slingshot and Second Wave add-on content. A new Genetics Lab

allows you to physically augment your soldiers' chests, brains, eyes, skin

and legs, while a Cybernetics Lab enables the development of the new

Mechanized Exoskeletal Cybersuit, or MEC. You now have stronger, faster

warriors and a new MEC Trooper class with specialized abilities and suits

that can carry flamethrowers and grenade launchers. Your engineering team

and the Foundry tirelessly work to develop new weapons and equipment to

give your operatives an extra tactical edge against two new alien classes

including the Mechtoid. Fortunately, a valuable new alien resource, the

MELD, has been released into the landscape, providing access to new

research and upgrades. Then take the battle online to mix and match aliens

and soldiers and combine abilities to outsmart and overpower your opponent

in adrenaline-pumping, one-on-one, turn-based multiplayer matches. With

this Complete Edition, you'll be ready for any alien threat you encounter



The Complete Edition includes XCOM: Enemy Unknown, XCOM: Enemy Within

expansion pack, Elite Soldier add-on content and Slingshot add-on content



Install Notes



1. Extract RARs

2. Unpack the archive file

3. Copy crack to /binaries/linux/x86_64 and /xew/binaries/linux/x86_64

4. Start the game ./xcom.sh

5. Have fun!



Requires Ubuntu 14.04 64bit OS to play
